title: Ore shika Shiranai Karada
original_name: 俺しか知らないカラダ
sinopse:
One day, Ryouhei received a sudden confession from his schoolmate, Ishiguro. But it's not a shy confession of love. It was a confession of "Will you have sex with me just once?" Ryouhei, who accepted Ishiguro's confession based on interest, tried to enjoy the light pleasure, but...?

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
